EC2-Instance-Scheduler

Posted on March 14, 2019

One fine day at work, I was playing around with “Cloud Custodian” which is a tool to schedule instances on-and-off during certain time provided. For example, we would want to have those instances running between 9am to 5pm weekdays. This helps us reduce cost specially if we have 1000’s of... [Read More]
